name: Bread, Games and AngrySmile
description:
This game was made for Beginners Circle Game Jam #4.

The player has been kidnapped by AngrySmile to fight in his arena and entertain the audience. You will be given freedom after you win the show! 

Increase you popularity by completing quests. The more popular you are, the better powerups spawn.

Controls - 

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

Left Click - Shoot/Attack

E - Toggle Quests Tab

Developers - 

Genr1se - Artist

Nemesis - Programmer

Credits - 

Font - Kenney

Music - Fesliyan Studios

Thanks for playing...
